alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 3:13PM MDT until May 26 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Fremont County in central Wyoming... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 312 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Sand Draw, or 15 miles south of Riverton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Fremont County, including the following locations... Riverton Landfill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
